name: NeonatalIntensiveCareUnit(NICU)
title: Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU)
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent neonatal intensive care units (NICU).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Encounter, Performed, or attribute related to Location. The intent of this data element is to identify patients in intensive care units.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with neonatal intensive care units (NICU). This is a grouping of HSLOC and SNOMEDCT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
